prefered_jobs.job_description: What’s your deliverables: Analysis from financial and non-financial reports. Recommendation for better improvement in all aspect from the analysis. Create/update financial modelling based on recommendation given. Create/update SOP and flowchart based on business process analysis and recommendation. What you will do: Ensures timely and accurate monthly business/financial reports and plans. Researches, analyzes and synthesizes data from multiple sources into business information as directed and by self-identification. Analyzes and reports on key drivers of business and company performance, including monthly and quarterly results and variance analysis. Develops financial models and methods to analyze volume and margin trends to develop both short and medium-term forecasts. Provides high level performance “dashboard” quality reports to senior management or executive team. Connect with CEO/Business Lead and get their perspective of their business long-term target Assists in budgeting, revenue and expense analysis, business trends analysis, and special ad hoc projects related to the designated business unit. Develop feasibility study of a proposed project/business What we need from you : Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in Financial Management / Accounting / Business with GPA >3.00 from reputable university. Having 1-2 experiences in Accounting and Finance will be advantage will be advantage Deep understanding financial statements Having high analytical skill Good skills in Excel, Power Point, Word (Power BI will be advantage) Fluent in English both oral & written Candidates must working carefully in financial analyze and good in reporting Creative, communicative and having high willingness to learn Candidates must be hardworking and persistent at work

assessment: INTJ-T You are a strategic thinker with a strong analytical mindset, perfectly suited for roles that require deep analysis and data-driven decision-making. Your preference for structured environments, such as investment banking and quantitative finance, indicates a desire for stability and a long-term vision in your career. You thrive in positions that allow you to leverage your analytical modeling skills and contribute to social impact ventures, showcasing your motivation to make a difference. Your experience in various analytical roles and entrepreneurial ventures suggests that you are not only capable of working independently but also excel in collaborative settings where innovative ideas can flourish. Overall, you exhibit a blend of independence and a commitment to social responsibility, making you a valuable asset in any data-centric organization.
